about.title: About Us
about.heading: Octopus — A Platform Connecting Professionals and Companies
about.description: Octopus is a platform created by Transformative Coaching Inc., based in the USA, and specifically adapted to the labor market of Azerbaijan. Our goal is to bring local companies together with skilled professionals and provide high value to both sides. We have deep experience in human resources and a strong team of experts. Our team understands how an improperly fulfilled position can create challenges for a company, and how the right opportunity can become a turning point in a professional’s career. With the experience we have gained over the years, our strong understanding of the local market, and our wide professional network, we offer high-quality, reliable, and effective support to both employers and job seekers with a personalized approach.
